title: Tribe AI raised venture capital to keep up with demand after six years of bootstrapping
content:
When Jaclyn Rice Nelson and Noah Gale launched AI talent and services company Tribe AI in 2019, they had to convince companies that having an AI strategy mattered. After the release of ChatGPT in 2022 and the AI mania it ushered in, the startup has experienced a “massive boom” in demand, Gale told TechCrunch. Rice […]

title: TechCrunch Minute: This startup wants to make Wordle for chess
content:

title: Announcing the agenda for the SaaS Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
content:
Software as a service (SaaS) is an ever-evolving industry. We’ll talk to some of the sharpest minds and professionals in the industry — executives from early- and late-stage SaaS companies, leaders from the infrastructure companies that power the industry and the venture capitalists who fund them. Explore and enjoy, and we hope you’ll join us […]

title: On AI, new UK gov’t to work on ‘appropriate’ rules for ‘most powerful’ models and beef up product safety powers
content:

title: Test automation platform Tricentis acquires SeaLights
content:
Tricentis, the well-funded test automation platform that helps developers find bugs in their code (now with the help of AI, of course), today announced that it has acquired SeaLights, a startup that makes the automated testing process more efficient by focusing only on the code that has changed. The two companies did not disclose the […]

title: Didero is using AI to solve supply chain management at mid-market companies
content:
Supply chain management remains a stubborn problem for many mid-market companies that can’t afford SAP or lack sufficient IT resources to manage a complex program. Didero, an early-stage startup, decided to build an AI-fueled tool to make it easier on them. Today, the company announced a $7 million seed investment. While it was at it, […]

title: The Way app offers a chance to meditate alongside a Zen Master
content:
A new app called The Way is aiming to help people explore the deeper side of meditation through a single, structured path guided by an authorized Zen Master. Founded by uncle-and-nephew duo Henry Shukman and Jack Shukman, The Way wants to help people move beyond modern mindfulness practices offered by popular meditation apps like Headspace […]

title: Kandji raises another $100M for Apple device management as valuation rises to $850M
content:
At a time when many startups have struggled to raise money and keep their heads above water, Kandji, an Apple device management platform, has been an exception. title: Matera raises $100M from Warburg Pincus to help the US catch up to Brazil in instant payments
content:
To say that Pix, the instant payment system created by the Central Bank of Brazil, has been a resounding success is an understatement. With Pix, money moves directly between core banking systems of different financial institutions. Adoption has been widespread and ubiquitous. The country’s residents have the ability to even pay street vendors using the […]

title: Local experience discovery startup, Bigfoot, adds GenAI to fast-track weekend planning
content:

title: Tinder’s AI Photo Selector automatically picks the best photos for your dating profile
content:
Tinder revealed last year that it was testing a photo-selection feature that uses AI to help users choose the best photos for their dating profiles. Now dubbed “Photo Selector,” the Match-owned dating app officially launched the feature on Wednesday. It’s now available to all users in the U.S. and will roll out to international markets […]

title: Instagram now allows users to add multiple audio tracks to Reels
content:
Instagram just announced that it will allow users to add multiple audio tracks to their Reels worldwide. The company noted that users can add up to 20 tracks in a single Reel. To add a new track to your video, tap on the “Add to mix” option in the Reel editor. Once you add the […]
